channel.title: Homestuck Smalltown (10/12) [Day 2] - Megido's Fall
channel.description:
## Homestuck Smalltown
#### Based off of Andrew Hussie's Odyssey-like webcomic, Homestuck
##### Click this to read it: [Homestuck](https://www.homestuck.com/)
### [Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515_) Click the rules link above if needed No excessive AtE, Swearing, or Emotionally trying to mess with players is allowed with one exception. (See below) Cohost: @Luxy
### Gameplay Days will be 48 hours max Nights will be 24 hours max Any class can be an order or chaos troll Roles are revealed at the start of the game Alignments will not flip on death Prospit trolls win when all Derse trolls are dead Derse trolls win when their numbers equal that of the Prospit trolls Derse trolls have a factional kill, however a Derse troll may use it alongside their given ability only when targeting a player that is lower than them on the blood heirarchy. The blood heirarchy also determines the order of abilities being done, from highest to lowest, if there is any conflict.
### Chats There will be a DM for dead chat There is a DM for Sollux's Neighborhood And there is a DM for the Derse troll chat
### Post Restrictions All trolls will have post restrictions, also called typing quirks, tied to their role. Break it three times, and you will find yourself modkilled for not staying in character.
### Lynching To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" in bold and on a separate line please Lynching is both Majority and Plurality If there is a tie by plurality, no one will die by lynch Also: No Twilight Posting please (This means you Max)
### After The Night Feedback will be given via DMs
### Journals Message me your entire journal in [quote] and [/quote], the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### Deathnotes No deathnotes, a good killer doesn't leave any traces
### Alignments
[quote]
[color=orange]**Prospit Troll**[/color] You have the aura of all that is good and little funny carapacians. And also a lot of light.
_Defeat all the Derse Trolls that hide among you._ [/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**Derse Troll**[/color] With the blessings of the Black King, you are out to eradicate your other trolls and the Prospit Guard.
_Match the numbers of the Prospit Trolls and take majority._ [/quote]
### Roles and Blood Heirarchy
(Typing Quirks are in Bold)
The Lowest [quote] **The Knight of Blood**
[color=red]**Karkat**[/color] - Your vote counts as two.
**EVERYTHING MUST BE IN ALL CAPS. FOR EVERYTHING.**
(Although because the forums hates all caps, you must add a short lowercase word at the end of each post, separated from your main post by a line. Or just some other random filler text will do too.) [/quote]
[quote] **The Maid of Time**
[color=brown]**Aradia**[/color] - Know the alignments of players who die. Once per game, you may receive one 50 character message from a dead player of your choice.
**Before receiving a message from a dead player, must substitute all ‘o’s with ‘0’s. After receiving a message, the typing quirk and modkill punishment is removed, and you may type with normal syntax and grammar.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Page of Breath**
[color=orange]**Tavros**[/color] - Once per game, you may become a dead role.
**Before becoming a dead role, must type so that the fIRST lETTER oF eACH wORD iS nOT cAPITALIZED aND aLL sUBSEQUENT lETTERS aRE. After switching roles, gains the typing quirk of the new role.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Mage of Doom**
[color=yellow]**Sollux**[/color] - During the day, you may add players to your neighborhood at the start of that night, and choose players to remove from your neighborhood at the end of the night.
**All ‘s’s mu2t be 2ub2tiituted with a number ‘2’ and ‘i’ must be 2ub2tiituted wiith ‘ii’. All attempt2 two u2e the word2 “to” and “too” mu2t be 2ub2tiituted wiith “two”.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Rogue of Heart**
[color=olive]**Nepeta**[/color] - Each night, occupy a player.
**All punctuation except “!”, “?” and “,” may not be used. All uses of ‘ee’ must be substituted with ‘33’ and :33 or :333333 in some variant must be used at least once per post.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Sylph of Space**
[color=darkgreen]**Kanaya**[/color] - Each night, protect a player from all visits.
**The first letter of every word must be capitalized. Otherwise, you may use perfect syntax and grammar.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Seer of Mind**
[color=teal]**Terezi**[/color] - Each night, ~~see~~ smell who a player visits.
**EVERYTHING MUST BE IN ALL CAPS. EVERYTHING. Except: All uses of the letter “a” must be substituted with the number “4”, and the same with “e” with “3” and “i” for “1”.**
(Although because the forums hates all caps, you must add a short lowercase word at the end of each post, separated from your main post by a line. Or just some other random filler text will do too.) [/quote]
[quote]
**The Thief of Light**
[color=blue]**Vriska**[/color] - Each night, watch a player and see who visits them.
**All uses of the letter “b” and anytime a section would be pronounced like the word “eight”, such as “ate”, “ait”, “aite”, etc. must 8e replaced with the number ‘8’.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Heir of Void**
[color=darkblue]**Equius**[/color] - Twice per game, defend a player. You will kill any visitors to them.
**No final punctuation may be used at the end of sentences. Replace all uses of the letter “x” and the word “cross” with %. Any word mentioning STRENGTH or FIGHTING or MUSCLES, and other words of physical prowess, must be capitalized. Also, you are free to talk about how wonderful horses are as much as you want.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Bard of Rage**
[color=indigo]**Gamzee**[/color] - Once per game, kill a player.
**All words must be written as aLtErNaTiNg cApS aNd lOwErCaSe, sTaRtInG wItH lOwErCaSe. You are the only one allowed to use AtE, expletives, cusses, and other pathos-like things in the entire game.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Prince of Hope**
[color=purple]**Eridan**[/color] - Each night, compare a player's alignment to the player previously checked.
**All uses of the letter “w” must be substituted with “ww” and “v” must be substituted with “vv”. Cannot use “want to” and “going to” and other formal language, and instead must use colloquial slang like “gonna” or “wanna” or “killin”.** [/quote]
[quote] **The Witch of Life**
[color=magenta]**Feferi**[/color] - Twice per game, ensure a player's action is guaranteed and make it prioritized right after yours.
**Only applies when these letters are capitalized. All uses of a capital letter “H” must be substituted with “)(“, and uses of a capital letter “E” must be substituted with “-E”.** [/quote]
The Highest
### To Join To join, you know the drill
## Rolelist [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=orange]**Prospit**[/color] [color=purple]**Derse**[/color] [color=purple]**Derse**[/color] [color=purple]**Derse**[/color]
## Players 1. Maximus - [color=indigo]**Gamzee**[/color] 2. Squid - [color=magenta]**Feferi**[/color] - x 3. Hjasik - [color=yellow]**Sollux**[/color] - xx 4. Pug - [color=teal]**Terezi**[/color] 5. Jasmine - [color=brown]**Aradia**[/color] - Killed N1 6. Marl - [color=blue]**Vriska**[/color] - x 7. Insanity - [color=purple]**Eridan**[/color] 8. Blue - [color=orange]**Tavros**[/color] - x 9. Isaac - [color=olive]**Nepeta**[/color] - xx 10. Math - [color=darkblue]**Equius**[/color] - Lynched D1 11. Geyde - [color=red]**Karkat**[/color] 12. Icibalus - [color=green]**Kanaya**[/color]
## Links [Day 1 Begins](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/homestuck-smalltown-12-12-day-1/73880/98?u=livicus) [Night 1 Begins](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/homestuck-smalltown-11-12-night-1-the-strangling/73880/565?u=livicus)
